#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int i,t,n,cal1,cal2,x,y;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		vector<int> row(101),col(101);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d%d",&x,&y);
			row[x]++;
			col[y]++;
		}
		cal1=cal2=0;
		for(i=0;i<101;i++)
		{
			if(row[i])
				cal1++;
			if(col[i])
				cal2++;
		}
		printf("%d\n",min(cal1,cal2));
	}
	return 0;
}
